desc: Top Wedding planners and event planners and designers Boston and NYC share tools, guides, and templates for wedding and event planners within their first five years of business. Social media help for wedding planners, contracts for wedding planners, stationery etiquette, budgets, timelines, and much more!

layout.text: Welcome to our new shop, the Brilliant Boutique!

We're Sarah and Chelsea, the magic makers behind Team Brilliant! When we first started planning, there was a lot of trial and error before we found success. Now, we run a 6-figure business and mentor a limited number of aspiring planners per year. We've used our experience to create tools and templates that make planning and running a business easier. Our shop is full of essentials made just for you - our fellow, empire-building creative.
